About Us

Project Description

In this project, our team built a website that showcases a collection of stock photos of flowers provided by a website called Pexels. Using a static site generator called Eleventy, our team created a home page displaying thumbnails of each photo. We worked exclusively with MVP.css, a minimalist stylesheet for HTML elements, and added neccessary standard page elements. We also created individual pages for each photo using only semantic HTML with the exception of using CSS for the page's background color with each photo's specific average color field.
